# hash(into:)

**Instance Method**

Hashes the essential components of this value by feeding them into the given hasher.

## Declaration

```swift
func hash(into hasher: inout Hasher)
```

## Parameters

- **hasher**: The hasher to use when combining the components of this instance.
title: hash(into:)
